description: This is the main App component for a React.js frontend application, managing theme toggling, user logout, and rendering the main layout including header, router, and footer.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main functional component that provides theme context, handles theme toggling, user logout, and layout rendering.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Function to toggle between 'light' and 'dark' themes.

methods.name: handleLogout
methods.description: Removes authentication token and redirects to login page.
